text: News | NEWS & ANNOUNCEMENTS Dr. Gubanov published a paper in the August issue of Communications of ACM Aug 19, 2020 Michael Gubanov has published a paper in Communications of ACM, together with collaborators from Rice University. The journal is known to be very selective, summarizing the most impactful contributions to Computer Science across all areas. Gubanov describes a novel data analytics system, marrying linear and relational algebra, introduced by Edgar Codd in Communications of ACM in 1970 and used widely in data management systems today. read more Dr. Shayok Chakraborty receives the AWS Machine Learning Research Award Apr 28, 2020 FSU Computer Science Assistant Professor, Dr. Shayok Chakraborty, has received the prestigious AWS Machine Learning Research Award for his project “Active Learning with Imperfect Oracles”. read more « Older Entries Next Entries » STUDENT HIGHLIGHTS Students Chosen to Attend Grade Hopper Conference Oct 19, 2017 Florida State Computer Science students Ms. Gokila Dorai, Ms. Rebecca James, Ms. Jordan Snow, and Ms. Soheila Abishrami were chosen to attend the GraceHopper read more Two papers from the CS department accepted by ACM CCS, one of the top security conferences Aug 30, 2017 Two papers from the CS department have been accepted by this year’s ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security (CCS), one of the top security conferences. read more « Older Entries Next Entries »
